languages.text: "Польщен, Ваша Светлость! Уверяю, что разить еретиков не сложнее, чем стрелять по серфам на дне рождения моей тетушки. Пожалуй, вооруженный противник даже придает процессу определенную пикантность".

"I am flattered, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I can assure you that smiting heretics is no more difficult than shooting up serfs at my aunt's birthday party. In fact, fighting an armed opponent may even add a certain spice."
languages.original_text: "Польщен, Ваша Светлость! Уверяю, что разить еретиков не сложнее, чем стрелять по серфам на дне рождения моей тетушки. Пожалуй, вооруженный противник даже придает процессу определенную пикантность".

traits.locale_text: "I am flattered, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I can assure you that smiting heretics is no more difficult than shooting up serfs at my aunt's birthday party. Perhaps fighting an armed opponent even adds a certain spice."

"I am flattered, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I can assure you that smiting heretics is no more difficult than shooting up serfs at my aunt's birthday party. In fact, fighting an armed opponent may even add a certain spice."

languages.text: «¡Me halaga, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Le aseguro que aniquilar herejes no es más difícil que disparar a los siervos en las fiestas de cumpleaños de mi tía. De hecho, creo que luchar con un oponente armado le añade un toque más emocionante».
languages.original_text: "I am flattered, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I can assure you that smiting heretics is no more difficult than shooting up serfs at my aunt's birthday party. In fact, fighting an armed opponent may even add a certain spice."

traits.locale_text: «¡Me halaga, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Le aseguro que aniquilar herejes no es más difícil que disparar a los siervos en las fiestas de cumpleaños de mi tía. De hecho, creo que luchar con un oponente armado le añade un toque más emocionante».

languages.text: 「光栄です、陛下！異端者を叩くのは、叔母の誕生日パーティーで農奴を撃ち殺すより難しくはないでしょう。それどころか、武器を持った相手と戦うのは、ある種の刺激になるかもしれません」
languages.original_text: "I am flattered, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I can assure you that smiting heretics is no more difficult than shooting up serfs at my aunt's birthday party. In fact, fighting an armed opponent may even add a certain spice."

traits.locale_text: 「光栄です、陛下！異端者を叩くのは、叔母の誕生日パーティーで農奴を撃ち殺すより難しくはないでしょう。それどころか、武器を持った相手と戦うのは、ある種の刺激になるかもしれません」

languages.text: “我受宠若惊，大人！我可以向您保证，消灭那些异端分子的难度，和在我姑姑的生日宴会上射杀农奴没差多少。老实说，和武装起来的对手作战，甚至还会平添几分乐趣。”
languages.original_text: "I am flattered, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I can assure you that smiting heretics is no more difficult than shooting up serfs at my aunt's birthday party. In fact, fighting an armed opponent may even add a certain spice."

traits.locale_text: “我受宠若惊，大人！我可以向您保证，消灭那些异端分子的难度，和在我姑姑的生日宴会上射杀农奴没差多少。老实说，和武装起来的对手作战，甚至还会平添几分乐趣。”

languages.text: "Ich bin geschmeichelt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Ich kann Euch versichern, dass Ketzer niederzustrecken kein bisschen schwieriger ist, als bei der Geburtstagsfeier meiner Tante auf Sklaven zu schießen. Gegen einen bewaffneten Gegner zu kämpfen, verleiht der Sache sogar noch eine gewisse Würze."
languages.original_text: "I am flattered, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I can assure you that smiting heretics is no more difficult than shooting up serfs at my aunt's birthday party. In fact, fighting an armed opponent may even add a certain spice."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin geschmeichelt, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Ich kann Euch versichern, dass Ketzer niederzustrecken kein bisschen schwieriger ist, als bei der Geburtstagsfeier meiner Tante auf Sklaven zu schießen. Gegen einen bewaffneten Gegner zu kämpfen, verleiht der Sache sogar noch eine gewisse Würze."

languages.text: « Vous me flattez, Votre Seigneurie. Je peux vous assurer qu'abattre des hérétiques n'est pas plus difficile que de tirer sur des serfs à l'anniversaire de ma tante. J'irais même jusqu'à dire qu'affronter un adversaire armé pimente quelque peu l'exercice. »
languages.original_text: "I am flattered, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I can assure you that smiting heretics is no more difficult than shooting up serfs at my aunt's birthday party. In fact, fighting an armed opponent may even add a certain spice."

traits.locale_text: « Vous me flattez, Votre Seigneurie. Je peux vous assurer qu'abattre des hérétiques n'est pas plus difficile que de tirer sur des serfs à l'anniversaire de ma tante. J'irais même jusqu'à dire qu'affronter un adversaire armé pimente quelque peu l'exercice. »

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, teveccühünüz! Kâfirleri haklamanın düz ovada keklik avlamaktan zor bir yanı yoktur ya. Hatta silahlı bir rakibe karşı savaşmak, bir nevi bu işi tatlandırıyor."
languages.original_text: "I am flattered, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! I can assure you that smiting heretics is no more difficult than shooting up serfs at my aunt's birthday party. In fact, fighting an armed opponent may even add a certain spice."
